dc_title_s: Pigot & Co.'s new plan of London : taken from the best authorities with the geographical bearings from the Dome of St. Pauls (and formed into divisions by means of circular lines each division being referred to in their list of streets & public buildings in the metropolis) the whole forming the most complete guide to London & its vicinity yet published
dc_description_s: Map of London showing streets, parks, city boundary, prisons, boroughs and canals.; Includes explanation in upper left corner.|51.2 x 76.2 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:15,840|City Maps
dc_publisher_s: Published by J. Pigot & Co.,  24 Basing Lane and 16 Fountain Street (London)
